Manage Your Entire e-Commerce from a
Single
Platform
The all-in-one platform that automates orders, inventory, accounting, and customer care‚Äîso you can focus on what matters: scaling your brand.
üöÄ Start Your Free Trial Today
Brands That Rely on Etaps:
We‚Äôve Got You
Covered
From seamless parcel booking to real-time tracking and cost-effective shipping, Etaps is designed to simplify logistics and help your business succeed.
Save 10+ Hours Weekly
Order processing, inventory updates, payment tracking
Real-time sync eliminates overselling & stockouts
Auto-reconcile accounting discrepancies
Omni-Channel Genius
Centralize WhatsApp, calls, SMS
Auto-send courier alerts & updates
Resolve issues faster, boost loyalty
Grow Faster with AI Insights
Predict sales trends & demand spikes
Track marketing ROI, optimize ad spend
City-wise courier performance analytics
Marketing Report Boom
Profitability per campaign (ROI, delivery %)
Cancelled order analytics by campagin
Double down on high-CLV campaigns
eCommerce
Orders & Inventory,
Sorted!
Centralized Order Hub
Sync orders from Shopify, Daraz, WooCommerce, and more. Process, pack, and ship in minutes.
Smart Inventory Control
Auto-sync stock levels across channels. Get alerts for low stock or overstock.
Scan & Pack Magic
Use barcodes to speed up warehouse workflows. Handle returns seamlessly.
Book your Demo
Omni-Channel Customer
Genius
If you‚Äôre in need of business management software, you‚Äôve come to the right place.
We have a user friendly, comprehensive, modular solution which cover all aspect of ecommerce business!
Unified Inbox: WhatsApp, calls, SMS, social media‚Äîall in one place.
Auto-Notifications: Order confirmations, courier alerts via WhatsApp/SMS.
PTA-Linked UAN: One verified number for all customer interactions.
Reporting
The
First & Only
E-Commerce Marketing Report
Finally, know EXACTLY which campaigns are burning cash‚Äîand which are printing money.
Profit per Rs. spent (after delivery, returns, courier fees)
Delivery success rate per campaign
Cancellation/return ratio by source
Why eTaps.me?
Here‚Äôs what happens when you
switch
Before eTaps.me ‚ùå
After eTaps.me ‚úÖ
Overselling, stockouts, manual sync
Real-time inventory across 10+ platforms
Missed calls, scattered WhatsApp/SMS
Unified inbox for all customer chats
Losing 40% revenue to COD fraud
Track real profit from delivered orders
5+ courier dashboards, delayed tracking
Bulk updates, city-wise analytics
Manual payroll, accounting errors
Auto-PNL reports, tax compliance, HRM
üöÄ Start eTaps Trial Today
Before eTaps.me ‚ùå

Overselling, stockouts, manual sync
Real-time inventory across 10+ platforms
Missed calls, scattered WhatsApp/SMS

Track real profit from delivered orders

Bulk updates, city-wise analytics
Manual payroll, accounting errors
Auto-PNL reports, tax compliance, HRM
üöÄ Start eTaps Trial Today
Realtime notifications
Wow
Your Customers
All Couriers, One Dashboard: TCS, Leopards, and more.
Bulk Tracking: Update 1,000+ orders in seconds.
City-Wise Reports: Optimize delivery partners by location.
Customer success
case studies
Discover how businesses like yours transformed with our software. Real stories of growth, innovation, and success.
CONTACT  TODAY
Etaps has completely transformed our shipping process! Managing multiple couriers from one platform saves us so much time and effort.
HMN Studio
Founder & CEO
We used to struggle with tracking orders across different courier services, but Etaps makes it seamless. Now, I can focus on growing my business!
Rewari Sweets
Director
Fast, reliable, and super easy to use! Etaps helped us cut shipping costs while improving delivery times. Highly recommended to all Ecommerce Businesses.
Air Vibez
CTO
Get started
Ready to Turn Chaos into
Profit?
Join 1,000+ brands automating their success with eTaps.me.
Start Free Trial
Etaps is your all-in-one logistics solution, simplifying parcel bookings with multiple courier partners. From real-time tracking to seamless order management, we help businesses deliver smarter.

Get solution to your all problems to simplify complex processes, making eCommerce operations more efficient and less stressful.
Smart Solutions for
Seamless
Logistics
Etaps offers a complete suite of logistics solutions‚Äîfrom automated parcel booking to real-time tracking and cost optimization. Streamline your operations and enhance efficiency with our all-in-one platform.
Marketing Essentials
Let you to understand customer needs, creating value, building relationships, and effectively communicating offerings to target audiences
Product Management
Sourcing, managing inventory, and analyzing sales trends which drive overall business growth in the highly competitive eCommerce landscape.
Customer Interaction Management
Customer interaction management helps meaningful connections with customers by understanding their needs, addressing their concerns, and providing personalized experiences.
Artificial Intelligence
Using AI can help you create a more efficient sales process by gathering data about your customers, automate follow-up abandoned cart inquiries, product recommendation and more.
Courier Management
The right courier management system can help a company stay competitive, optimize delivery time, reduce shipment costs and returns.
Content Management
Manage your content smartly to attract your customers with enhanced buying experience and quick ordering.
Reporting & Analytics Tools
How to improve your business? For this you need in depth reporting and different analytics tool which monitor and indicate key improvement areas.
Inventory Management
Inventory management is very tedious task in ecommerce but our inventory management module will make it very easy for your business.
